name: Count Larger and Smaller
author: Kay Akashi
statement: You are given an array $a$ consisting of $n$ integers $a_{1}$, ..., $a_{n}$. Then in each of $m$ lines you are given an integer $x$ and an operation: "LARGER" or "SMALLER". If the operation is "LARGER", your task is to output the number of elements in $a$ that are STRICTLY larger than $x$. If the operation is "SMALLER", your task is to output the number of elements in $a$ that are STRICTLY smaller than $x$.

subtasks.constraints: $1 \leq n, m \lt 100$. Neither element in $a$ nor $x$ is smaller than $-300$ and larger than $300$.
$100 \leq n, m \leq 10^{5}$. Neither element in $a$ nor $x$ is smaller than $-10^{5}$ and larger than $10^{5}$.

input:
The first line of input contains one integer, $n$.
The second line contains $n$ integers that compose an array $a$.
The theird line of input contains one integer, $m$.
Following are $m$ lines each of which contains an integer $x$ and an operation which is either "LARGER" or "SMALLER".
